description:
• Contributed to the development of COBASE, a large-scale multi-bank platform utilized by 1,500 banks across Europe.
• Enhanced secure API integrations and migrated front-end systems from Polymer to modern frameworks like React and Vue.js.
• Implemented secure REST APIs in Java with Spring Boot, following OWASP security guidelines.
• Applied clean code standards, including Checkstyle and SpotBugs, to ensure maintainable and robust code.
• Developed and tested scalable backend solutions while improving user experience with a focus on performance, security, and modern design principles.
• Contributed to code reviews and technical documentation to maintain high software quality standards.
Worked on mobile application development with Flutter. Focused on building an e-learning platform with Firebase and GetX, integrating real-time chat and notifications.
